msbt.message: I hear you had yourself a busy day here yesterday, .Dunno where you get the energy for all your shenanigans, .
Heard you were reelin' 'em in like crazy yesterday, !You're gettin' a reputation around here as a pro angler, .
Is it true you caught a zillion bugs here yesterday, ?Because I could always use a few pointers from a pro, !
Heard you did some beachcombin' yesterday, Did you keep everythin' you found?<10_4 /> If so, that seems a little shellfish.Gahaha! Shellfish, get it?
So I hear you've been doin' a bit of clammin', Well, good for you!I'm not fast enough to dig up those slippery li'l critters, .
I hear you put on a sharpshootin' clinic with that slingshot of yours yesterday, ! So is it true that you didn't miss a single balloon, ?

Those shooting stars sure were pretty yesterday, huh?<10_4 /> Heard you were out there wishin' on 'em Don't know how you handle wishin', but I usually wish for everythin' I can think of. Why not, ? You never know, right? One of 'em might just stick.
Is it true you shook a whole mess of trees yesterday, ?I would've been worried about shakin' loose a wasp nest on top of myself,
Arms sore today? Heard tell you were choppin' away at a bunch of trees yesterday,
Had no idea you were a logger!Everyone's still talkin' about that tree-cuttin' spree you went on the other day, .
Reckon you're a real gardenin' enthusiast, !Heard you did a whole bunch of plantin' around here. Thanks for all your effort, !
Thanks for yesterday! Heard about all your waterin' work, .You must be doin' somethin' right, 'cause our flowers are lookin' nice.
What was with all your theatrics yesterday, ?Heard you were reactin' super dramatic-like to just about everythin', .
I hear you were visitin' other islands yesterday, Seems like you got friends all over. Make sure to put in a good word for us while you're abroad!
You do sure have yourself a whole mess of friends, !I mean, it felt like they took over our island yesterday, !
Sounds like you were DIYin' up a storm yesterday! How'd all your work turn out, ?I admire anyone with the patience— and back strength—to stand at a workbench that long, .
Is it true you broke a bunch of your tools yesterday, ?Reckon you need some tools as tough as you are, !
Is it true you're hidin' an alien away in your place, ?No? So why've you been holed up inside so much lately, ?Gotta stop listenin' to crazy rumors
You sure seem to like bein' outdoors! Heard you were out and about a lot yesterday, Hey, nothin' wrong with gettin' some fresh air and sunshine, .
I heard what you did yesterday Were you really buryin' pitfall seeds all over the place, ? Just hope you ain't expectin' me to fall for your shenanigans! Gahaha!
Gotta say I felt for you, when I heard about you fallin' into all them pits yesterday, Had plenty of days like that myself.
Did all that racket I heard walkin' past your place yesterday mean you were redecoratin', ? Sounded like furniture scrapin', with lotsa angry mutterin' in between
Hey, I heard you were seen messin' around on your phone a whole bunch yesterday, . Were you workin' on some custom designs? Don't forget to share 'em when you're ready, !
You sure did have a lot to say for yourself yesterday, !Ain't complainin', mind you! Only thing better than chattin' with you is doin' it over .
Heard you spent most of yesterday talkin' with Just puttin' it out there, but I'm also a good listener, and I got plenty of free time for chattin', .
Heard you were quite the chatterbox yesterday, .Anytime you got a good story, I'm all ears, !
Heard about your bad luck yesterday gettin' stung by wasps, .Be careful when you go shakin' trees.
Heard you got stung yesterday. Wasps can be mean little critters sometimes, A little nest paper ain't worth all that stingin', if you ask me.
So I hear tell you dug up a mess of fossils yesterday, .Wonder if I'd recognize any of 'em from back in the day, Just kiddin', I ain't that old! Or AM I? Gahaha!
Sounded like you were smackin' every last rock on this island with your shovel yesterday, . Ain't there some less-noisy way to chip yourself off them bits of rock for your DIY projects and whatnot?
Are you OK, ?'Cause I heard you were seen buryin' some cash yesterday, !Don't worry, I ain't gonna dig it up or nothin'. I just wanna make sure you can really afford to lose the Bells
I hear you picked yourself a ton of fruit yesterday, !You're uh, not plannin' on eatin' all of that by your lonesome, I hope?Too much of a good thing can give you a real bellyache, .
Heard you were spotted fiddlin' around on your phone a bunch yesterday, . If you're ever up to givin' lessons on how to use them consarned doodads, I'd sure be obliged, .
So is it true you were starin' at your phone a lot yesterday, ? Careful you don't strain your peepers squintin' at that cockamamie thing
Thanks a bunch, !Whaddaya mean, for what? I heard about all that hard work you put in buildin' roads,
Heard you dug out a bunch of new rivers yesterday, .I'm real proud to know someone with your kinda gumption, !
Just heard about all that earthmovin' you did yesterday, !Reckon a strong kiddo like you can really change things around here, whenever you set your mind to it.
I hear you were buildin' fences yesterday, !Everyone who saw you workin' says you looked like a pro, !
What's this I hear about you movin' furniture here and there outdoors yesterday, ? You do know no one's expectin' you to decorate our whole island for us don'tcha, ?
You must really be rackin' up them Nook Miles, !Wanna know how I puzzled that out?<10_4 /> I just saw you grinnin' at your phone and guessed is all, !
So Tom Nook seems pretty impressed that you managed to pay back your loan in full already, . Must feel great to have that weight off your shoulders, huh? Only wish I knew what that was like firsthand
So I heard you were shoppin' at Nook's Cranny a bunch yesterday. Lookin' at somethin' in particular?I know how it feels when you're on the fence about whether to spend the Bells on somethin', .
Is it true you came up with that new island tune for us yesterday?<10_4 /> You got decent taste, !Must've heard me whistlin' the classics, . Gahaha!
I sure did fancy the look of that new flag I saw hangin' outside of our Resident Services yesterdayWait, you were the one who came up with that design, weren't you? I like your style, .
There's a crazy story goin' around that you got a magic wand you can use to change outfits, . Ain't that a corker? 'Course, I did think Tom Nook was pullin' my leg about his fancy phone doodad
Sounds like you were leapin' over a lot of rivers yesterday with that vaulting pole of yours, .You must be gettin' pretty good by now at usin' that doodad.

So I heard that you've been buyin' up a mess of turnips from Daisy Mae. If that price goes up, you'll be set! Make sure they don't go bad, though! Those turnips won't be worth a lick if they're rotten.
Rumor has it that you made a killin' on the stalk market, !You may have an instinct for turnip futures, but be careful you don't get too cocky and spend it all too quick.
Was that your voice I heard carryin' on yesterday, ?Didn't realize you were such a chatterbox, !
Heard about all that weedin' you did yesterday, !Sure is swell of you to work hard at beautifyin' our island, .
Is it true you switched up your style yesterday, ?Never seem to notice stuff like that unless it's pointed out, .Reckon I should pay more attention.
Hey, did you change up your look? It'll take some gettin' used to, but I reckon I like it, !
I heard you were takin' lots of photos yesterday, .Get any you're really happy with? I never seem to get things centered right in my photos,
